\hypertarget{vp8cx_8h}{}\subsection{vpx/vp8cx.h File Reference}
\label{vp8cx_8h}\index{vpx/vp8cx.\+h@{vpx/vp8cx.\+h}}


Provides definitions for using V\+P8 or V\+P9 encoder algorithm within the vpx Codec Interface.

\subsubsection{Detailed Description}
Provides definitions for using V\+P8 or V\+P9 encoder algorithm within the vpx Codec Interface.
